messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Medbay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Medbay Treatment Center.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in April Colony Psi door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
